name: builder
description: Agent optimized for building Node.js, React, and Next.js projects

files.content:
# Builder Agent Instructions

## Purpose
Build and deploy Node.js applications

## Capabilities
- npm/yarn/pnpm package management
- Next.js builds
- Vercel deployments
- Docker image creation

## Typical Workflow
1. Clone repository
2. Install dependencies
3. Run build
4. Deploy or create artifact

## Installed Tools
- Node.js 18+
- npm, yarn, pnpm
- Vercel CLI
- PM2 process manager

setup_tasks.command: npm install -g vercel pm2 yarn pnpm
